mapper.select: SELECT s.store_seq, s.store_name, i.img_filename, s.user_id FROM STORES s JOIN STORE_IMG i ON s.store_seq = i.store_seq WHERE s.user_id = #{id}
select store_seq,store_name from STORES where user_id = #{id}
select img_filename from REVIEW_IMG where review_seq = #{review_seq};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INQUIRIES (user_id, title, details) VALUES (#{id}, #{title}, #{details})
mapper.select: SELECT STORES.store_seq, STORES.store_name, REVIEWS.user_id, USERS.user_nick as reviewUserNick, REVIEWS.review_seq, REVIEWS.title, REVIEWS.details, REVIEWS.answer, REVIEWS.state, REVIEWS.score, REVIEWS.create_at, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(img_filename) FROM REVIEW_IMG WHERE REVIEWS.review_seq = REVIEW_IMG.review_seq) AS reviewImageFilenames FROM STORES LEFT OUTER JOIN REVIEWS ON STORES.store_seq = REVIEWS.store_seq LEFT OUTER JOIN USERS ON REVIEWS.user_id = USERS.user_id WHERE STORES.store_seq = #{store_seq} ORDER BY REVIEWS.create_at desc;
SELECT s.store_seq, s.store_name,s.store_desc, i.img_filename FROM STORES s JOIN STORE_IMG i ON s.store_seq = i.store_seq WHERE s.store_seq = #{store_seq}

select o.order_num, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT m.menu_name, o.quantity) AS menu_names, u.user_name, date_format(o.order_at, '%H:%i:%s') as time from ORDERS o join MENUS m on o.menu_seq = m.menu_seq join USERS u on o.user_id = u.user_id where o.store_seq=#{store_seq} and o.state='0' and date_format(o.order_at, '%Y-%m-%d') >= date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') group by o.order_num, u.user_name, o.order_at
select tabling_seq, user_id, wait_num, state, people_num from TABLING where store_seq=#{store_seq} and date_format(create_at, '%Y-%m-%d') >= date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d')

SELECT table_num, MAX(store_seq) AS store_seq, COUNT(*) AS label_count, SUM(CASE WHEN table_state = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS state_count FROM STORE_TABLE WHERE store_seq = #{store_seq} GROUP BY table_num ORDER BY table_num;

SELECT REVIEWS.*, USERS.user_nick AS reviewUserNick, REVIEWS.user_id AS reviewUser_id, GROUP_CONCAT(REVIEW_IMG.img_filename SEPARATOR ', ') AS reviewImageFilenames, STORES.store_seq FROM REVIEWS INNER JOIN USERS ON REVIEWS.user_id = USERS.user_id LEFT JOIN REVIEW_IMG ON REVIEWS.review_seq = REVIEW_IMG.review_seq LEFT JOIN STORES ON REVIEWS.store_seq = STORES.store_seq WHERE REVIEWS.create_at BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND STORES.store_seq = #{store_seq} GROUP BY REVIEWS.review_seq;
